title: Intensive Short-Term Course for Improving English Speaking Skills for Science Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Conversation Skills and Understanding of Scientific Terminology
context.additional_context: Real-life task-centered learning linked to workplace environments for professionals, optimized for smartphone accessibility

learning_goals: Learners can fluently speak for over three minutes using 50 core English expressions required in science-related practical situations.
Learners can deliver English presentations explaining science experiment procedures through collaboration with peer learners.
Learners improve speaking skills by completing over 80% of real-life tasks (e.g., international conference presentation simulations) provided in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
